Name: Barren
Description: At least 60% of area is non-vegetated barren (sand, rock, soil) or permanent snow/ice with less than 10% vegetation.

Name: Permanent Snow and Ice
Description: At least 60% of area is covered by snow and ice for at least 10 months of the year.

Name: Water Bodies
Description: At least 60% of area is covered by permanent water bodies.

Name: Urban and Built-up Lands
Description: At least 30% of area is made up of impervious surfaces including building materials, asphalt, and vehicles.

Name: Forest/Cropland Mosaics
Description: Mosaics of small-scale cultivation 40-60% with >10% natural tree cover.

Name: Natural Herbaceous
Description: Dominated by herbaceous annuals (<2m). At least 10% cover.

Name: Natural Herbaceous/Croplands Mosaics
Description: Mosaics of small-scale cultivation 40-60% with natural shrub or herbaceous vegetation.

Name: Herbaceous Croplands
Description: Dominated by herbaceous annuals (<2m). At least 60% cover. Cultivated fraction >60%.

Name: Unclassified
Description: Has not received a map label because of missing inputs.
